events.message: I received the laptop yesterday, but the screen has several scratches and it appears to be faulty. I am very disappointed with the condition of the product.
The reported issue has been classified under the Product Defect category based on the keywords detected in the customer's message.
A support agent has been assigned to the case to assist with the defective product complaint raised by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear your laptop has arrived damaged. I’m here to help you resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and any other damages? Also, let me know if the device powers on correctly.
I have attached the photos showing the scratches on the screen. The laptop does turn on but the display flickers sometimes, which is very frustrating.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will arrange it promptly.
I’d like to go with the replacement option as soon as possible. Please send me the instructions on how to return the faulty laptop.
We have processed your replacement request. A prepaid shipping label to return the damaged laptop has been sent to your email. Your new laptop will ship within 2 business days.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your replacement laptop and everything is working perfectly now. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
As per your confirmation, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for allowing us to resolve your product defect issue satisfactorily.
